# Overview

## Goal

Introduce a plan-writer subagent and update PDD plan file naming to avoid confusion between orchestrator plans and plan-writer scope.

## Context

The current task file name is 5-TASKS.md. The request is to clarify plan-writer ownership, update documentation and prompts, and define the new plan-writer handoff workflow.

## Non-Goals

- Implementing test/document agents
- Changing unrelated workflows
